section.title: require_cpp11.h
section.programlisting: 1 5 #ifndef REQUIRE_CPP11_H 6 #define REQUIRE_CPP11_H 7 8 #if __cplusplus < 201103L 9 #error "This library needs at least a C++11 compliant compiler, maybe compiler argument for C++11 support is missing or if you use Arduino IDE upgrade to version >=1.6.6" 10 #endif 11 12 #endif // REQUIRE_CPP11_H
